# http://pypi.python.org/pypi/feedparser/

# http://pygments.org/
# http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Pygments
Pygments>=1.6,<1.7

# http://trac.saddi.com/flup
# http://pypi.python.org/pypi/flup
# needed, for fastCGI usage
flup>1.0.2,<1.1
